name: Casa Grande Suite Hotel of South Beach

reviews.text: This was the worst hotel ever!! The hot water was VERY limited so if you are with a party of more than one, you better take a 30 second shower. The face/hand/body towels were non-existent and when we asked for more, the "staff" replied by saying they were all out and did nothing to try to find more. Isn't it great to come from the beach and have to shower with your hands... NOT!! The customer service was extremely poor. The only PRO was the space but I'd rather pay more for a true hotel experience. I will NEVER stay here again and hope this finds others before hard earned money is wasted.
reviews.title: worst hotel ever

likes.disliked: — No hot water; No towels; Not great room service; Poor Staff

reviews.text: These are individually owned condos and there must be great disparity between the units, judging by previous reviews and a friend's strong recommendation to stay in a one bedroom suite with a terrace, which I tried to book but was denied on arrival because Casa Grande messed up my reservation. But they told me I was in an ocean view, so I didn't make a big deal about it, at least not until I saw the garbage they were trying to pass off for over $340/night.
reviews.title: Grande? No, Casa Terrible

reviews.text: For starters, my room (204) was damaged and badly in need of repair (holes in the wall, paint peeling, leaking faucets, etc.). The air conditioning unit sounded like a diesel engine. If your shower was longer than 2 minutes, you were standing in ankle deep water. The coffee table rocked like a hammock and seemed like it was ready to fall over at any minute. The silverware was simply on a paper towel in the drawer. The mattress was perhaps the worst I've slept on since college. You get the point.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel
The staff were wonderful!
reviews.text: Aside from the room itself, there were a few things I didn't like about the hotel in general, including: there is poor ventilation in the lobby area, which had a musty smell most of the time; the stairwell also smelled like a cross between bad food and urine; the towels ranged from sandpaper to ones that were so new they left a white cotton coat on my hands and body; a front desk staff that didn't seem to care too much about anything and blamed my incorrect reservation on the "new girl."

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Yes, the location is great, but there are a bunch of nicer looking hotels along Ocean Drive, and for $1500+ for 4 ngihts, I'd rather spend the extra $$$ somewhere else (Loews?) or else be sure which room you are reserving. I doubt I could give this place a second chance.
reviews.title: Best Address in South Beach!

reviews.text: The hotel was excellent. Great location, great staff and beautiful suites with full kitchens and some good ocean views. Its really more like a condo than a hotel room. Will stay here again next time in Sobe.
reviews.title: Faultless

likes.disliked: — The fact all hotels aren't like this
